content: k2tog* to next stitch marker sm slip next 38-42-46-50 sts = up to 2 sts before the fourth stitch marker on another piece of scrap yarn from now on we will call this arm2 stitch holder cast on 11 new stitches k2tog rm *yo k2tog* to 2 sts before the end put the last 2 sts on the body stitch holder turn note the 2 markers that remain should be at the left and right side of the back panel excluding the 11 underarm stitches tip for underarm stitches the 11 cast on stitches will be picked up when working the arm to make this easier weave a piece of scrap yarn in a contract color though the stitches right after you cast them on that way you can see exactly which threads to pick up when working the arm body row 42 ws p until the last 2 stitches put these on the stitch holder turn row 43 rs k1 *yo k2tog* until the first marker sm yo k2tog k2tog *yo kt2tog* until 2 sts before second marker k2tog sm *yo k2tog* until 2 sts before the end put these sts on the body stitch holder turn row 44 ws p to marker sm p2tog p to 3 sts before marker ssp p1 sm p to 2 sts before the end put these 2 sts on body stitch holder turn row 45 rs k1 *yo k2tog* to 2 sts before end put these 2 sts on body stitch holder turn row 46 ws p until 2 sts before the end put these 2 sts on body stitch holder turn work row 43-46 a total of 3 times next row *k1tbl p1* put sts from body holder on needles and work *k1tbl p1* across these sts too from here the piece is worked in the round you can remove the 2 stitch markers and place 1 new stitch marker for bor work 5 rounds in ribbing in total bind off with a stretchy bind off i used this one https //www youtube com/watch v=sbzeeg6xmwm arm pick up 38-42-46-50 sts from arm stitch holder and 11 sts under arm put bor marker in the middle of these 11 sts so that when knitting 6 underarm sts will be worked first then 43 sts from the arm stitch holder and lastly 5 more underarm sts attach yarn at the bor marker and work *k2tog yo* until 5 sts before the end on your left needle pick up a thread from between the arm stitches and the underarm stitches and work *k2tog yo* three more times 54 sts on needles round 2 k to the last st move bor marker here round 3 yo k2tog k2tog *yo k2tog* repeat until last 2 sts k2tog round 4 k ssk k until last 2 sts k2tog round 5 *yo k2tog* round 6 k work rounds 3-6 a total of 6 times 26-30-35-38 sts remaining work rounds 5-6 46 more times work rounds 3-4 one more
